json.Body:
Hi Testing McTester,

Welcome to Innovatio!

To kick off your onboarding, please review these Jira tasks assigned to you:

  1. Task 1
  2. Task 2
  3. Task 3
  4. Task 4
  5. Task 5

You can track your full onboarding task here:
https://[real id will come here].atlassian.net/browse/ON-2

Hereâ€™s your personalized onboarding folder:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/[real id will come here]

Weâ€™ve also messaged you on Slack â€” feel free to reply there with any questions. Your mentor or manager will check in soon. We're excited to have you!

Warmest regards,
The Innovatio Team
